text: inna l-laha ish'tara mina l-mu'minina anfusahum wa-amwalahum bi-anna lahumu l-janata yuqatiluna fi sabili l-lahi fayaqtuluna wayuq'taluna waʿdan ʿalayhi haqqan fi l-tawrati wal-injili wal-qur'ani waman awfa biʿahdihi mina l-lahi fa-is'tabshiru bibayʿikumu alladhi bayaʿtum bihi wadhalika huwa l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
